A1: a mix of residences and industry
RelatedSentence: Two men were shot Monday afternoon in the Ivy City neighborhood of Northeast Washington , near Gallaudet University and in an area that has a mix of residences and industry , according to D.C. police .
Police said the other victim ran across a bridge over New York Avenue , one of the District 's busiest roads , and collapsed at Brentwood and W streets , near the Rhode Island Metro station .
Police said the other victim ran across a bridge over New York Avenue , one of the District 's busiest roads , and collapsed at Brentwood and W streets , near the Rhode Island Metro station .
Police released few immediate details and no arrest or description of the gunman was available .
Police could not say on Monday whether there is any connection to the two incidents .
